Verifies that storing and sending Secure cookies over http sends Network.*ExtraInfo events with corresponding blocked cookies.

ResponseReceivedExtraInfo blocked cookies:[
    [0] : {
        blockedReasons : [
            [0] : SecureOnly
        ]
        cookie : {
            domain : cookie.test
            expires : -1
            httpOnly : false
            name : name
            path : /inspector-protocol/network/resources
            priority : Medium
            sameParty : false
            secure : true
            session : true
            size : 9
            sourcePort : 8000
            sourceScheme : NonSecure
            value : value
        }
        cookieLine : name=value; Secure
    }
]
RequestWillBeSentExtraInfo blocked cookies:[
    [0] : {
        blockedReasons : [
            [0] : SecureOnly
        ]
        cookie : {
            domain : cookie.test
            expires : -1
            httpOnly : false
            name : name
            path : /inspector-protocol/network/resources
            priority : Medium
            sameParty : false
            secure : true
            session : true
            size : 9
            sourcePort : 8443
            sourceScheme : Secure
            value : value
        }
    }
]
